page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My age is 11 and I become 12 in September. My day begins at 7.30 am, that is when I get up and change in to my school uniform. I tidy my room then go down for breakfast. It's Cornflakes and Hot chocolate again.(MMmm!) After breakfast I go to the bathroom and have a wash and clean my teeth.(It is now about 8.20 am), I get my school bag ready then read, at the moment I am reading a series of books about Super Gran by Forrest Wilson. They are humorous books about a little old lady called Granny Smith , telling how she uses her super powers. At 8.40 am, I get on my shoes, coat, and bag to go to school. At 9.00 am, the bell goes and we all go in. Our first subject is assembly. We sing two hymns, have a story from our headmaster, and then go to our class lessons.
